title: Addition Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:  parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared .

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=4u^3$$ and $$b=1$$ into the addition binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(4u^3+1\right)}^2={\left(4u^3\right)}^2+2\times4u^3\times1+1^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 4 u cubed,  and  b is equal to 1  into the addition binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 4 u cubed, plus 1,  squared is equal to parentheses 4 u cubed,  squared plus, 2 times 4 u cubed times 1 plus 1 squared
